name: Ace Pilot: Alien Assault
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project. I made the following major modifications:

  1. Three unique, fully featured levels
  2. Several new mechanics, such as puzzles, extra lives, shield power-ups, enemy spawn rooms, hidden rooms, keys and locks, and more
  3. Boss battles!

There are also many smaller changes throughout, so see if you can spot them. Press the escape key if you ever need to pause or look at the controls.

Credits

Created by Logan Chavez

Level 2 music by B.G.M on Unity Asset Store

Extra life, key collect, puzzle solve, and shield sound effects by 3rd Note Inc. on Unity Asset Store
